news_header: Trump attacks Zelensky, calling him a dictator, prompting backlash from European leaders supporting Ukraine's legitimacy.
news_original_title: Trump calls Zelensky a 'dictator' as rift between two leaders deepens
news_text: President Trump has criticized Ukraine's President Zelensky, labeling him a dictator and deepening tensions. European leaders defend Zelensky's democratic legitimacy amidst ongoing conflict.
